text:

John.Reilly@xelector.com
text:
Because its not possible to exclude files from a javadoc task, the patch makes 
a temporary copy of the src, excluding files it doesn't need and then generates 
the javadocs from that copy of the src and deletes the tmp src afterwards.
This still doesn't seem to have gone in. ??
creator: John.Reilly@xelector.com

text:
I'm not too happy with doing extra operations just to avoid 2-3 warnings ...

The non-Tyrex related warning are gone, OTOH.
The other two warnings (@see) seem to me like they give useful information, but 
Javadoc doesn't like links pointing to sources it doesn't have (although the 
sources are from the core JDK). So I'll leave them in too.
creator: remm@apache.org
